block_comment: This block of code is responsible for instantiating a receiver for "dqs_odd" signals whenever there's a rising edge detected on the 9th bit of the "dqs_odd". It utilizes an edge-triggered always block to execute the procedure "dqs_odd_receiver" targeting the 9th bit on every positive edge of the "dqs_odd" signals, effectively creating a mechanism for capturing data during specific timing intervals.
